name: Roy Tang
text: I don't think it's just the ad hominems and the misinformation and whatnot. I think on some level meron talagang cultural divide dun sa far extremes. For example, there are people who value safety and stability a lot more than fighting for perceived injustices. Trust is also very low among different groups. For some, misogyny has become an acceptable method of responding to people whose views you don't like. Etc.

source_obj.text: I don't think it's just the ad hominems and the misinformation and whatnot. I think on some level meron talagang cultural divide dun sa far extremes.
